Reviews.Title: Pleasantly surprised
Reviews.Author: :) consumer
Reviews.Content: I knew I was getting a Blackberry Curve 8330 and charger. I was pleasantly surprised to see a car charger, silicone and leather holster case and a second back with a minor scratch. The phone itself didn't have one scratch on it. There was a bit of confusion in terms of the shipping date but when I contacted the seller via email, he responded fast and cleared everything up; it even came a day early. I'm happy to find both chargers worked properly and cases were new. I paid $24.99 for all this and I'm definitely going to buy again from this seller. Two thumbs up!

Reviews.Title: Great phone for business or personal use.
Reviews.Author: GM Phones 4 Less
Reviews.Content: This is still my favorite BlackBerry. It's not too fancy and the keyboard is large and easy to use. Overall, it gets the job done.

Reviews.Title: good seller but keep in mind that the phone is not a recent model
Reviews.Author: Viridiana Balbino
Reviews.Content: This phone will be good for more basic use but I would not recommend it for more complicated stuff. My friend sent me a picture and after that I was unable to receive any more txt from him. The browser is hard to find and I still cant set up my e-mail. It wont let me. But it is nice that it came with a carrying pouch, head phones, charger and other accessories.

Reviews.Title: Outdated
Reviews.Author: Grock62 "Grock62"
Reviews.Content: This phone crashes and is cumbersome to use many features such as internet.  Once you have an iphone or similar it's hard to go to this phone.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: Hope Dube "I love listening to books while I ...
Reviews.Content: I love this phone. Great deal. Much more affordable then a new one and works as well with my plan. Great deal.

Reviews.Title: Decent Phone
Reviews.Author: Victoria
Reviews.Content: good phone to have after my HTC died on me after two years. decent placement holder until i get my new one. awesome battery. sometimes it freezes but i wouldnt expect much from a blackberry. i got it earlier than expected. and i would definitely buy from this person again. everything was in there even a free phone case.

Reviews.Title: Great customer service
Reviews.Author: Halla
Reviews.Content: I was so happy when I called and talked to someone about how the mail lost my phone but directbuy wireless was so nice n understanding and they sent me another phone with no cost. Great customer service.!

Reviews.Title: Blackberry Curve 8330
Reviews.Author: dc117
Reviews.Content: Fast shipping! Overall great phone with minor scratches and the phone charger that came with it didn't work at all, so phone wasn't able to charge. Had to purshace a new charger at a local store.

Reviews.Title: Wont do again
Reviews.Author: Dave from Indy
Reviews.Content: Received phone very quickly;however, it didn't work at all. I took it to sprint store and they told me it was defective so I contacted Amazon. They contacted seller who immediately contacted me and refunded my money as soon as phone was returned. All in all, bad product sold by a good vendor who quickly responded and made right.

ProductInfo.Features:
2.0 Megapixel Camera Shoots Print-quality Photos With Expandable Memory
Built-in GPS Receiver With Location-based Applications Like BlackBerry Maps
Advanced Bluetooth Wireless Technology Supports Streaming Stereo Music
Voice-activated Dialing Lets You Dial The Phone With Just Your Voice
Instant Messenger - Yes, BlackBerry Messenger Pre-loaded, Spell Checker
ProductInfo.Name: No Contract Titanium Blackberry Curve 8330 Phone for Sprint
